pr_title: Configure label in Spring Cloud Config Client extension

timeline.bodyText:
We generally try to avoid having lambdas in code that executes at runtime.
Can you please replace it with an if statement?
timeline.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: Okay, replaced the lambda with an if statement.
replies.author: pukkaone

timeline.message:
Configure label in Spring Cloud Config Client extension

Add configuration property quarkus.spring-cloud-config.label to request
a specific label rather than let Spring Cloud Config Server apply a
default label.

Fixes #11211
